subject: Re: MGA - Support Updates
preview: Hey team! closing this one for the SLA, thank you so much

full_threads.body: Hey team! closing this one for the SLA, thank you so much

Hi Daphne,

That's perfect, thank you!

Thank you for removing my e-signature too.

Best wishes,

Kathy

Hi Kathy,

The PDF has been updated and is now uploaded to the Book an Appointment page.

We've:
  1. Extended the 'Email' fields (top and bottom) to allow for longer email addresses
  2. Removed the box that was overlapping your e-signature and replaced it with a dotted line for clarity

Just a quick note - we’ve also removed your e-signature for now. Let us know if you’d prefer we keep it in and just remove the box instead - happy to adjust.

@daphne reply to client:
—
Hi Kathy.

The PDF has been updated and is now uploaded to the Book an Appointment page.

Please let us know if there’s anything else you’d like us to assist you with — we’re happy to help!

—
(Time: 15mins)
Can close once update is sent. Thanks!
@cindy - please delegate to one of our devs for faster action

Hi Cindy,

Thank you!
A couple of final edits:
(1) please make the 'Email' field (in both top and bottom boxes) longer to accommodate longer email addresses
(2) I inserted my e-signature, however, it appears behind the box, as shown in the attached.

Many thanks,
Kathy

Hi Kathy.

Here's the updated PDF.

Kindly check and let me know if there's anything else you'd like to update before I upload to the site.

Thank you!

Many thanks Cindy!
However, all the fields with multiple lines don't really work - it's not allowing continuation of text onto subsequent lines..
Would be great if you can fix this.

Much appreciated,
Kathy
(Time: 20mins)

Hi Kathy.

I have updated the referral form email.

For the fillable PDF, I just tried an online tool to do it and I have attached what I have created.

Kindly review and see if this works for you and I will replace in the site.

Many thanks Cindy and Will!
@Cindy, could you please also update the email address on the referral form? Possible to also turn the referral form into a fillable PDF?

Much appreciated,
Kathy
Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Kathy,

It looks like everything is now set up with your emails.

I’ve also updated the auto-response for the Stay Connected form, which users will receive upon submission.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need!

Thanks Cindy - I can see the test form was received via the admin@ email address so it looks like we are all good 🙂

Well Being Notice: Receiving this email outside of normal working hours? Managing work and life responsibilities is unique for everyone. I have sent this email at a time that works for me. Please respond at a time that works for you :-)

Thanks for the update, William!

I've updated the email address to Admin@mygenomeaustralia.com.au for the following forms:
  • Enquire
  • Stay Connected
  • Book an Appointment

I’ve also submitted a test entry through the Enquire form. Could you please confirm if it was received on your end?

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Good Morning Cindy, just letting you know that we have now setup Cloudflare as the DNS host - can you check everything at your end to ensure that all is working properly and let me know if any issues - Kind Regards, Will

Hi Cindy,

Thanks for the update.

For the auto-reply which currently reads:
Thank you for your interest in staying connected! You will receive periodic updates on any genomics-related news, research breakthroughs, clinical trial and research opportunities.
Stay well, MGA team!

Please make minor edits to:
Thank you for your interest in staying connected! You will receive periodic updates on any genomics-related news, research breakthroughs, clinical trial and research opportunities.
Stay well,
The MGA team.

Look forward to further updates once email is set up.

Thanks,
Kathy

Hi Kathy,

Just a quick update - the requested changes have been completed:

  1. Updated content on the Partners page

  2. Temporarily removed the logos

  3. Updated the email notification text for submissions via the Stay Connected form


We're currently waiting on an update from William regarding the DNS. Once that's sorted, we'll proceed with updating the email addresses on the forms.

Thanks Cindy- much appreciated
Yes, we will be managing DNS through Cloudflare.
I'll let you know when it's all been migrated so that you can test at your end
Kind regards, Will :-)

Hi William!

I just wanted to confirm — are you looking to transfer the DNS to Cloudflare?

At the moment, the DNS is managed through our Kinsta account. If you do need to handle the DNS from your end, we can provide you with the necessary DNS records.

Here’s the list of records for your reference:
A Record
  • Host: @
  • Value: 162.159.134.42
  • TTL: 1 hour

CNAME Records
  • Host: _acme-challenge.mygenomeaustralia.com.au.
  • Value: mygenomeaustralia.com.au.kinstavalidation.app
  • TTL: 1 hour

  • Host: www.mygenomeaustralia.com.au.
  • Value: @
  • TTL: 1 hour

TXT Records
  • Host: _cf-custom-hostname.mygenomeaustralia.com.au.
  • Value: d663308b-a42d-46d4-b224-4bcd65b76330
  • TTL: 1 hour

  • Host: kinsta-verification-bcf73e.mygenomeaustralia.com.au.
  • Value: aaad3620-8940-4bb2-8716-2540a4db7909
  • TTL: 1 hour

Please let me know if there's anything else we can help you with.

• done updating the https://mygenomeaustralia.com.au/partners/ (removed the logos and updated the texts)
  • done updating the Auto-Reply for "Stay Connected" Submissions

please check @cindy
(TIme:20mins)
@glen kindly work on the quick edits and @joel will handle the DNS records task. Thanks!
